description.value: Once per day, a half-orc brought to 0 Hit Points but not killed can fight on for 1 more round. The half-orc drops to 0 HP and is @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.4MxAK5uS0zMNWhUK]{Dying} (following the normal rules for death and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.4MxAK5uS0zMNWhUK]{Dying}) but can continue to act normally until the end of his next turn, when he becomes @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.lf8pbezocjYIvR9y]{Unconscious} as normal. If he takes additional damage before this, he ceases to be able to act and falls @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.lf8pbezocjYIvR9y]{Unconscious}.
